Reviews.Title: “Careless staff”

Reviews.Title: “Affordable”

Reviews.Content: living amsterdam private apartments student dorms finally chance sleep hotel amsterdam idea sitting idea idea suitably located affordable basic hotel hotel alfa plantage expect little bit 185 tall pay eur yourself little bit spacey hotel

Reviews.Title: “Would happily stay again”
Reviews.Author: alisonjane39
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights 3 friends twin bedded fairly basic clean size bathrooms definately decent size doesnt offer breakfast didnt super cafe directly opposite location couldnt 1520 minute walk centre 10 euros taxi close easily werent troubled noise definately stay

Reviews.Content: hotel lovely 100 reccommed bathroon spotlessly clean looked recently decorated tv lots english channels inc movie channel shower powerful clean towels provided daily hotel lift staff friendly welcoming reception desk 247 hotel location ideal town centre peaceful nights sleep close walk town centre 15 minute walk centre theres lots stalls enjoyable walk trams frequent drop pick outside hotel takes 5 minutes tram cost 250 euros definitely stay
